Passengers
{{flight}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-search-flights', templateUrl: './search-flights.component.html', styleUrls: ['./search-flights.component.css'] }) export class SearchFlightsComponent implements OnInit{ searchResult: any = [ "American Airlines", "British AirWays", "Lufthansa" ] constructor() { } ngOnInit(): void { } }
